Author: hrabovskaan
Text: in summer 2018 i was the skinniest in my life, about 47 kilograms or less, i’m not sure. the thing is, that is my goal weight now and back then i still felt like i needed to lose at least few more kilograms. and here i am now, 10 kilograms heavier and restricting, overeating and restricting again🤡✌🏼but i looked so skinny omgg

Author: UnimpressiveEggs
Text: I was so self conscious at my goal weight. Looking back at photos, I'm angry at myself that I didn't appreciate it more and didn't realise how good I looked. I should have been flaunting it, not hiding under big jumpers and thinking I'd look better if lost another 20lbs. Now I'm like 50lbs heavier and truly miserable.
